headline: Invesco Advisers’ ESG Claims Draw $17.5 Million Fine From SEC
summary: (Bloomberg) -- Invesco Advisers Inc. will pay a $17.5 million fine to settle US Securities and Exchange Commission allegations that it misled clients about the share of company-wide assets under management that integrated environmental, social and governance factors into investment decisions.
